title: Why can`t we have a South-African server
body:
Many people in S-A is asking for one. 
Riot has a big enough player base here. 
People will play more League of Legends here if we can get a server here as we have a 200ms to 2000ms ping here sometimes and people leave to go play DOTA2 rather. 
With our ping so slow some players don`t wanna go play ranked games.

replies.body: make it just "African", and would seem more legit. there isnt one, is there?
i think u underestimate this continent size.

the thing is, if riot chose to implement an African server, they might well end up putting it in south africa, since I'm guessing it has better infrastructure, etc.

But you will never get them to respond to "hey build me a server just for MY COUNTRY".
It will have to ostensibly be for "the continent", I'm guessing.
